derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from late Latin paenitentialis, from Latin paenitentia 'repentance'

entry.def: Penitential means expressing deep sorrow and regret at having done something wrong.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to penitence or penance;

sentences.sentence: "the Day of Atonement is the great penitential day of the Hebrew calendar"
"wrote a penitential letter apologizing for her hasty words"
